verbose_text: In the livers of intact animals with normal behaviour, there is a coordinated rhythm of CLOCK : BMAL1 recruitment to the genome during the day, accompanied by histone acetylation and RNA polymerase II recruitment, which triggers a peak phase of transcription in the early part of the night [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: RNA polymerase II recruitment, which triggers a peak phase of transcription
